words.id: sesungguhnya||mendengar||Allah||perkataan||yang (wanita)||ia mengajukan gugatan kepadamu||pada/tentang||suaminya/pasangannya||dan ia mengadukan||kepada||Allah||dan Allah||mendengar||soal jawab kamu berdua||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Mendengar||Maha Melihat
words.en: Indeed||has heard||Allah||(the) speech||(of) one who||disputes with you||concerning||her husband||and she directs her complaint||to||Allah||And Allah||hears||(the) dialogue of both of you||Indeed||Allah||(is) All-Hearer||All-Seer

translations.text: Qad sami'al laahu qawlal latee tujaadiluka fee zawjihaa Wa-tashtakeee ilal laahi wallaahu yasma'u tahaawurakumaa; innal laaha samee'um baseer

words.id: orang-orang yang||(mereka) menzihar||diantara kamu||dari||istri-istri mereka||tidak||mereka (istri-istri)||ibu-ibu mereka||bahwa||ibu mereka||kecuali||yang (ibu-ibu)||melahirkan mereka||dan sesungguhnya mereka||benar-benar mengatakan||mungkar||dari||perkataan||dan dusta||dan sesungguhnya||Allah||benar-benar Maha Pemaaf||Maha Pengampun
words.en: Those who||pronounce zihar||among you||[from]||(to) their wives||not||they||(are) their mothers||Not||(are) their mothers||except||those who||gave them birth||And indeed they||surely say||an evil||[of]||[the] word||and a lie||But indeed||Allah||(is) surely Oft-Pardoning||Oft-Forgiving

translations.text: Allazeena yuzaahiroona minkum min nisaaa'ihim maa hunnaa ummahaatihim in ummahaatuhum illal laaa'ee waladnahum; Wa-innaahum la-yaqooloona munkaram minal qawli Wa-zooraa; Wa-innal laaha la'afuwwun ghafoor

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) menzhihar||dari||istri-istri mereka||kemudian||mereka kembali||terhadap apa-apa||mereka katakan/ucapkan||maka memerdekakan||seorang budak||dari||sebelum||bahwa||keduanya bercampur||demikian itu||kamu diajar||dengannya||dan Allah||terhadap apa||kamu kerjakan||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And those who||pronounce zihar||[from]||(to) their wives||then||go back||on what||they said||then freeing||(of) a slave||before||before||[that]||they touch each other||That||you are admonished||to it||And Allah||of what||you do||(is) All-Aware

translations.text: Wallazeena yuzaahiroona min nisaaa'ihim summa ya'oodoona limaa qaaloo fatahreeru raqabatim min qabli aien yatamaaassaa; zaalikum too'azoona bih; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona khabeer

words.id: maka barang siapa||tidak||mendapatkan||maka berpuasalah||dua bulan||berturut-turut||dari||sebelum||bahwa||keduanya bercampur||maka barang siapa||tidak||kuasa||maka memberi makan||enam puluh||orang miskin||demikian itu||supaya kamu beriman||kepada Allah||dan rasulnya||dan itulah||batas/batas/hukum-hukum||Allah||dan orang-orang kafir||azab||pedih
words.en: Then whoever||(does) not||find||then fasting||(for) two months||consecutively||before||before||[that]||they both touch each other||But (he) who||not||is able||then (the) feeding||(of) sixty||needy one(s)||That||so that you may believe||in Allah||and His Messenger||and these||(are the) limits||(of) Allah||and for the disbelievers||(is) a punishment||painful

translations.text: Famal lam yajid fa-siyaamu shahraini mutataabi'ayni min qabli aien yatamaaassaa famal lam yastati' fa-it'aamu sitteena miskeena; zaalika litu'minoo billaahi Wa-rasoolih'wa tilka hudoodul laah; Wa-lilkaafireena 'azaabun aleem

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||(mereka) menentang||Allah||dan rasulnya||mereka dihinakan||sebagaimana||dihinakan||orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum mereka||dan sesungguhnya||Kami menurunkan||ayat-ayat||jelas/nyata||dan bagi orang-orang kafir||azab||menghinakan
words.en: Indeed||those who||oppose||Allah||and His Messenger||(will) be disgraced||as||were disgraced||those||before them||before them||And certainly||We have sent down||Verses||clear||And for the disbelievers||(is) a punishment||humiliating

translations.text: innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo kubitoo kamaa kubital lazeena min qablihim; Wa-qad anzalnaaa aayaatim baiyinaat; Wa-lilkaa-fireena 'azaabum muheen

words.id: pada hari||membangkitkan mereka||Allah||semuanya||lalu Dia memberi tahu mereka||tentang apa-apa||mereka kerjakan||menghitungnya||Allah||dan mereka melupakannya||dan Allah||atas||setiap/segala||sesuatu||Maha Menyaksikan
words.en: (On the) Day||(when) Allah will raise them||(when) Allah will raise them||all||and inform them||of what||they did||Allah has recorded it||Allah has recorded it||while they forgot it||And Allah||(is) over||all||things||a Witness

translations.text: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamee'an fayunabbi'uhum bimaa amiloo; ahsaahul laahu Wa-nasooh; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in shaheed

translations.text: Alam tara annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi maa yakoonu min najwaa salaasatin illaa Huwa raabi'uhum Wa-laa khamsatin illaa huwa saadisuhum Wa-laaa adnaa min zaalika Wa-laaa aksara illaa huwa ma'ahum ayna, maa kaanoo summa yunabbi'uhum bimaa amiloo yawmal qiyaamah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in aleem

words.id: tidaklah||kamu lihat||atas||orang-orang yang||(mereka) dilarang||dari||pembicaraan rahasia||kemudian||mereka kembali||kepada apa||mereka dilarang||dari padanya||dan mereka berbicara rahasia||untuk berbuat dosa||dan permungsuhan||dan mendurhakai||rasul||dan apabila||mereka datang kepadamu||mereka mengucapkan salam kehormatan kepadamu||dengan apa-apa||tidak||menurut salam kehormatan kepadamu||dengannya||Allah||dan mereka mengatakan||pada||diri mereka sendiri||mengapa tidak||menyiksa kita||Allah||dengan apa/disebabkan||kita katakan||cukup bagi mereka||neraka jahanam||mereka memasukinya||maka seburuk-buruk||tempat kembali

translations.text: Alam tara ilal lazeena nuhoo anin najwaa summa ya'oodoona limaa nuhoo 'anhu Wa-yatanaajawna bil-ismi wal'udwaani Wa-ma'siyatir rasooli Wa-izaa jaaa'ooka haiyawka bimaa lam yuhai-yika bihil laahu Wa-yaqooloona fee anfusihim law-laa yu'azzibunal laahu bimaa naqool; hasbuhum jahannnamu yaslawnahaa fabi'sal maseer

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||apabila||kamu bicara rahasia||maka jangan||kamu bicara rahasia||dengan berbuat dosa||dan permungsuhan||dan mendurhakai||rasul||dan berbicara rahasia||dengan kebaikan||dan takwa||dan bertakwalah||Allah||orang-orang yang||kepada-Nya||kamu dikembalikan
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||When||you hold secret counsel||then (do) not||hold secret counsel||for sin||and aggression||and disobedience||(to) the Messenger||but hold secret counsel||for righteousness||and piety||And fear||Allah||the One Who||to Him||you will be gathered

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa tanaajaytum falaa tatanaajaw bil-ismi wal-'udwaani Wa-ma'siyatir rasooli Wa-tanaajaw bil-birri wattaqwaa wattaqul laahal lazeee ilaihi tuhsharoon

words.id: sesungguhnya hanyalah||pembicaraan rahasia||dari||syaitan||supaya berduka cita||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan tidaklah||memberi mudarat kepada mereka||sesuatu/sedikitpun||kecuali||dengan izin||Allah||dan atas||Allah||bertawakal||orang-orang yang beriman
words.en: Only||the secret counsels||(are) from||the Shaitaan||that he may grieve||those who||believe||but not||he (can) harm them||(in) anything||except||by (Allah's) permission||(by) Allah's (permission)||And upon||Allah||let put (their) trust||the believers

translations.text: innaman najwaa minash shaitaani liyahzunal lazeena aamanoo Wa-laisa bidaaarrihim shai'an illaa bi-iznil laah; Wa-'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minoon

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||apabila||dikatakan||bagi kalian||berlapang-lapanglah||dalam||majlis||maka lapangkanlah||melapangkan||Allah||bagi kalian||dan apabila||dikatakan||bangunlah||maka bangunlah||meninggikan||Allah||orang-orang yang||yang beriman||diantara kamu||dan orang-orang||(mereka) diberi||ilmu||derajat||dan Allah||dengan apa-apa||kamu kerjakan||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||When||it is said||to you||Make room||in||the assemblies||then make room||Allah will make room||Allah will make room||for you||And when||it is said||Rise up||then rise up||Allah will raise||Allah will raise||those who||believe||among you||and those who||were given||the knowledge||(in) degrees||And Allah||of what||you do||(is) All-Aware

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa qeela lakum tafassahoo fil majaalisi fafsahoo yafsahil laahu lakum Wa-izaa qeelan shuzoo fanshuzoo yarfa'il laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum wallazeena ootul ilma darajaat; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona khabeer

words.id: Wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||apabila||kamu berbicara rahasia||rasul||maka dahulukan||diantara||hadapan (sebelum)||pembicaraan rahasiamu||bersedekahlah||demikian itu||lebih baik||bagi kalian||dan lebih bersih||maka jika||tidak||kamu mendapatkan||maka sesungguhnya||Allah||maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||When||you privately consult||the Messenger||then offer||before||before||your private consultation||charity||That||(is) better||for you||and purer||But if||not||you find||then indeed||Allah||(is) Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa naajitumur Rasoola faqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqah; zaalika khairul lakum Wa-athar; fa-il lam tajidoo fa-innal laaha ghafoorur Raheem

words.id: apakah kamu takut||bahwa||mendahulukan||diantara||hadapan (sebelum)||pembicaraan rahasiamu||bersedekah||maka jika||tidak||kalian kerjakan||dan menerima taubat||Allah||atas kalian||maka dirikanlah||sholat||dan tunaikan||zakat||dan taatlah||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||dan Allah||Maha Mengetahui||dengan/terhadap apa-apa||kamu kerjakan
words.en: Are you afraid||to||offer||before||before||your private consultation||charities||Then when||you do not||you do not||and Allah has forgiven||and Allah has forgiven||you||then establish||the prayer||and give||the zakah||and obey||Allah||and His Messenger||And Allah||(is) All-Aware||of what||you do

translations.text: 'A-ashfaqtum an tuqaddimoo baina yadai najwaakum sadaqaat; fa-iz lam taf'aloo Wa-taabal laahu alaikum fa-aqeemus Salaata Wa-aatuz Zakaata Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-rasoolah; wallaahu khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

words.en: Do not||you see||[to]||those who||take as allies||a people||wrath||(of) Allah||(is) upon them||They (are) not||They (are) not||of you||and not||of them||and they swear||to||the lie||while they||know

translations.text: Alam tara ilal lazeena tawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu alaihim maa hum minkum Wa-laa minhum Wa-yahlifoona 'alal kazibi Wa-hum ya'lamoon

words.id: menyediakan||Allah||bagi mereka||azab||sangat keras||sesungguhnya mereka||amat buruk||apa||adalah mereka||mereka kerjakan
words.en: Allah has prepared||Allah has prepared||for them||a punishment||severe||Indeed, [they]||evil is||what||they used to||do

translations.text: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeedan innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo ya'maloon

words.en: They have taken||their oaths||(as) a cover||so they hinder||from||(the) way of Allah||(the) way of Allah||so for them||(is) a punishment||humiliating

translations.text: ittakhazooo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laahi falahum 'azaabum muheen

words.id: tidak||berguna||dari mereka||harta benda mereka||dan tidak||anak-anak mereka||dari||Allah||sedikitpun||mereka itu||penghuni||neraka||mereka||didalamnya||kekal

translations.text: Lan tughniya 'anhum amwaaluhum Wa-laaa awladuhum minal laahi shai'aa; ulaaa-'ika As-haabun Naari hum feehaa khaalidoon

translations.text: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamee'an fa-yahlifoona lahoo kamaa yahlifoona lakum Wa-yahsaboona annahum 'alaa shai'; alaaa innahum humul kaaziboon

translations.text: istahwaza alaihimush shaitaanu fa-ansaahum zikral laah; ulaaa'ika hizbush shaitaaan; alaaa innaa hizbash shaitaani humul khaasiroon

translations.text: Katabal laahu la-aghlibanna ana Wa-Rusulee; innal laaha qawiyyun 'Azeez

translations.text: Laa tajidu qawmaien yu'minoona billaahi wal-yawmil aakhiri yuwaaaddoona man haaaddal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-law kaanooo aabaaa'ahum aw abnaaa'ahum aw ikhwaa-nahum aw 'asheeratahum; ulaaa'ika kataba fee quloobihi-mul eemaana Wa-ayyadahum biroohim minhu Wa-yudkhilu-hum jannatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; radiyal laahu 'anhum Wa-radoo 'anhu; ulaaa-'ika hizbul laah; alaaa inna hizbal laahi humul muflihoon
